title: T202 Hassan - Center Panel Lot (6) - All HOFer's CRAWFORD, EVERS, BENDER, WHEAT+ Sold
author: D. Bergin

posts.post_title: T202 Hassan - Center Panel Lot (6) - All HOFer's CRAWFORD, EVERS, BENDER, WHEAT+ Sold
posts.post_content:
T202 Hassan Lot of (6) Center Panels

Economical way to pick up some vintage and attractive T-Cards of a bunch of HOF'ers.

Includes:

I'll let you read the backs on these, but the HOF'ers pictured include: Sam Crawford, Johnny Evers, Zack Wheat, Frank Chance, John McGraw and Chief Bender

Condition as shown in the scans. If you need bigger scans, let me know and I'll e-mail them to you. The Sam Crawford is in the roughest condition. The rest are a very presentable, clean looking lot.

SOLD for the set of (6) 

Pay almost any way you like.

PM to reserve or e-mail me at David at Boxingtreasures dot com

Thanks.

Price bump.

Now SOLD for the lot of 6 HOF'ers.
